fixes.name: Change in Netted
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression [Netted T]-[Netted T -1] to DAX by referencing the calculated fields as measures on the same table: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Netted T] and 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Netted T -1]. The calculation is a simple subtraction of two aggregated/calculated measures.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced fields Netted T and Netted T -1 are results of aggregated/LOD expressions (SUM and FIXED), so this calculation must be created as a measure.
